author: Victor Leung
title: Updating your operating system - DON'T
question:
A couple of people reported problems updating their Mac to 15.4.
In general the day before / day of an exam is not a good time to update your operating system.  I usually don't do updates except security issues during the term.  So if you haven't already updated then don't.
If you have updated try downloading a new version of Dr Racket and see if that helps.  Also be sure that after the update you are starting DrRacket and not racket.
